definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The school does not allow us to run in the corridor jumps.
sentences.chinese: 學校不允許我們在樓道里跑跳。

sentences.english: Second, no running in hallway and classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 在樓道和教室裏不要追跑打逗。

sentences.english: Then you see the lights in the stairs again light up.
sentences.chinese: 然後你看見樓道里的燈再次亮起來。

sentences.english: You push delay switch, lights in the stairs again light up.
sentences.chinese: 你按下延時開關，樓道里的燈又重新亮起來。

sentences.english: The corridor light bulb is broken, gu mother went upstairs had a fall.
sentences.chinese: 樓道里的燈泡壞了，顧媽媽上樓時摔了一跤。

sentences.english: He suggested (that) we should clean the corridor every day.
sentences.chinese: 他建議我們必須每天打掃樓道。

sentences.english: Even only that corridor and the window are left over.
sentences.chinese: 小到只剩下那個樓道，和那扇窗。

sentences.english: There appeared several newspaper stands at the comer of the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 我們樓道拐角多了幾個報紙架。

sentences.english: Then in the corridor lights suddenly dark.
sentences.chinese: 然後樓道里的燈突然暗下來。

sentences.english: The utility model solves the problem of the fume mixture of a corridor generally existing in the existing building.
sentences.chinese: 解決了目前樓房普遍存在的樓道串煙問題。

sentences.english: The candles made the whole place warm and romantic.
sentences.chinese: 這些蠟燭使整個樓道變得溫暖而浪漫。

sentences.english: Third, a new housing to face-painting, wall painting and building handrails .
sentences.chinese: 三是整治出新房屋立面，油漆粉刷樓道內牆面和扶手。

sentences.english: I cannot even remember meeting another tenant on the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至都記不得在樓道里碰到過其他房客。

definition: head of a flight of stairs
to extend one's head (out or into)/a probe/detector/search unit
